page.title: 12POCKET MONEY
page.content:
I get Â£2 a week for my pocket money.I get Â£1 pocket money from my dad and mum and I get some pocket money from my aunt and uncle,nans and grandads.I have to put 50p of it into my money box and 50p of it into the bank.I have also got to put some of my money in the jar that holds money for buyiny birthday presents for my relatives and friends. I always have to spend my money on things that are not rubbish otherwise I do not get any pocket money the next week.I can get some extra money by doing some jobs for my mum and dad,and I get some from my aunt who works in one of the sweet shops.I do the sweeping up in the sweet shop and I get some more pocket money from her.
{By Barbara Edwards age 10
